snippet: Justin Turner, the primary candidate to replace David Wright while he is out with a muscle strain, picked up his own injury Saturday during the Mets’ 4-2 loss to the Miami Marlins.
abstract: Justin Turner, the primary candidate to replace David Wright while he is out with a muscle strain, picked up his own injury Saturday during the Mets’ 4-2 loss to the Miami Marlins.

headline.main: Wright's Backup Justin Turner Rolls His Ankle
headline.print_headline: Now It’s Wright’s Fill-In Who Is Injured for Mets
